entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11 except minus 18 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
